content: vaatdoek dishcloth one of the most satisfying things about knitting for me is being able to make items that my family and i can use in our home one of the simplest things to make are knit dishcloths they are a fun and easy project and make a great housewarming gift too vaatdoek means dishcloth in dutch and growing up we always called them that even when we were speaking english i hope you ll enjoy knitting these to use in your home or to give to a friend or neighbour they re a great beginner project for those just learning to knit and a perfect palate cleanser for experienced knitters size approx 21 25 cm x 21 25 cm 8 5 inches x 8 5 inches 100% cotton 73 m 80 yd 50 g needles notions 3 25 mm or us 3 needles straight or circular tapestry needle yarn gauge bernat handicrafter cotton 20 stitches = approx 10 cm unblocked ___________________________________________________________________________ cast on 38 stitches using the long tail cast on method row 1-2 k1 p1 row 3-4 p1 k1 repeat row 1-4 until dishcloth measures approximately 8 5 inches cast off and weave in ends abbreviations k knit p purl tips you can make a larger or smaller dishcloth by increasing or decreasing the number of stitches you cast on just be sure to cast on an even number have fun with these knit with bright colours add stripes a fade the sky is the limit questions email me at thekitchensinkshop@gmail com i d love to see your vaatdoek dishcloths tag me @thekitchensinkshop #vaatdoek 2 © the kitchen sink shop
